title: Is meritocracy a flawed and harmful ideal? (STUDENT TAKEOVER)
description: In this student takeover episode, Abby Reyes discusses - Is meritocracy a flawed and harmful ideal? Abby has just completed her A-levels at Sydenham School and is going on to study Sociology at university. You can also follow Abby's Sociology blog here - https://sociologywithabby.blogspot.com/
itunes:author: Matthew Wilkin
